MAN.TITLE: title_properties
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: description of the Title entity properties
MAN.DESCRIPTION:
The Title entity is a leaf of the graphics entities hierarchy. It is associated to the axes graphics object. This entity defines the parameters for string drawing
This field contains the visible property value for the entity . It should be "on" or "off" .By default, the title is visible, the value's property is "on" . If "off" the title is not to display on the screen.
This field is the character string vector which contains the title.
The font_size property is used to select the type of size of the title. Its value should be an integer in between 0 and 5 whith stands for 8pt, 10pt, 12pt, 14pt, 18pt and 24pt.
Seven differents fonts are available : "Courrier", "Symbol", "Times", "Times Italic", "Times Bold", "User defined". The font_size property is an index in [0 6] which is associated to the previous font names.
This field contains the color used to display the title. Its value should be a color index (relative to the current colormap).
This property contains the handle of the parent. The parent of the title entity should be of the type "Axes" or "Agregation".
